Description.Text: The House Hotel Nisantasi is a contemporary 5-star boutique property offering elegant accommodation near the heart of Istanbul. Highlights include onsite dining, contemporary design, a gym, a library and an excellent location close to BJK Inonu Stadium. Sisli is a cosmopolitan residential area towards the north of European Istanbul. It developed in the late 19th and early 20th-centuries and features many modern structures alongside several impressive Art Nouveau buildings. Nearby places of interest include BJK Inonu Stadium and the huge shopping mall, Istanbul Cevahir. Osmanbey metro station is located in the vicinity, providing fast and easy access to other popular Istanbul destinations. The hotel occupies a modern mid-rise property featuring a white facade with wrought iron faux balconies. Facilities include a gym and a library. Massages are available on request. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. Classic rooms are 25sqm and decorated in a bright, contemporary style with custom-designed furniture. Amenities include air-conditioning, a flat-screen satellite TV, an iPod dock, a Nespresso coffee machine and a work desk. The marble en-suite bathrooms feature a walk-in shower. The Lounge Bar offers Turkish and international dishes in a sophisticated and intimate setting and guests can enjoy a range of cocktails and snacks at the stylish hotel bar. The hotel has a 24-hour reception.
